children.value: Cloudflare recommends API tokens as the preferred authentication method with Cloudflare APIs. This article walks through creating API tokens for authentication to the GraphQL Analytics API.
For more detail on API tokens and the full range of supported options, see
To create an API token for authentication to the GraphQL Analytics API, use this workflow:
Access the Create API Token page
Review and create your API token
Copy and test your API token
Access the Create API Token page
Log in to your Cloudflare account and select
from the user account drop-down list.

When you create a new token, a confirmation page displays that includes your token and a custom
To copy the token to your device's clipboard, click the
The token displays only on the confirmation page, so copy the token and store it safely, since anyone who has the token can use it to access your data.
If you lose the token, you can
